name: I am CAT
description:
I am CAT is our final project made during our Licence's first year at ENJMIN.

It had to be a JABJOB (Jeu À Base de Jet d'OBjets) -Game Based on Throwing Stuff-

The rules were : 

-It has to be 3D

-It has to be non violent

-You have to throw stuff in it.

We came up with this idea of playing a cat, which is just being a pain in the ass, like every cats are. Your goal is to explore the levels and break everything as you roam through them. Lower the satisfaction gauge of your owner until he finally eliminate you so you can reincarnate in one of your nine lives.

At the moment, only 5 levels are available, updates might come in the future to implement the missing ones

Controls are with keyboard and mouse.

A game made by :

Mathias Didier, Thomas Muniera, Johan Flatrès & Florent Bascoul

Original soundtrack, made with a lot of coffee, not a lot of time and FL Studio

Logo made by Elise Lafitte
